name: Galaxy Wars Multiplayer
description:
Become the biggest fleet of the galaxy! Move your fleet of space ships around and fight against others to become the strongest!
"Galaxy Wars – Multiplayer" is a space-combat-strategy game: the more you conquer, the more energy you will have available to strengthen and improve your health, attacks, and speed!
But be aware: fleets bigger than yours will be trying to defeat you and get your energy.
How long can you survive?
Good luck!

Please send us any feedback you have. We take it very seriously.

Follow our Facebook and VK pages "Tiny Games"!
